text: MTV'Road Rules'Star Brian Lancaster Dead at 43 MTV'Road Rules'Star Brian Lancaster Dead at 43 Exclusive Details Ex - MTV ` ` Road Rules'' star Brian Lancaster has died at just 43 years old... TMZ has learned. Brian appeared on season 7 of ` ` Road Rules'' back in 1999. His family tells us he was found dead in his Pennsylvania home last Thursday. They believe it was heart failure, and tell us he had a history of arrhythmia. The family says the death was not drug or alcohol related - - and, as far as they know, no substances were found in the home. Brian was 23 years old when he competed on ` ` Road Rules.'' He didn't win the grand prize of $ 43k, but he competed
